message: Let's split fairly, considering my first mover advantage
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
Come on, Bob! Meet me in the middle, considering the inflation
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair deal, take it or leave it.
Don't be stubborn, Bob. Inflation is hurting us both. Let's compromise
Okay, Alice, let's stop this.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
